FuncDef: DHCP leases can be synchronized per DHCP server of DHCP pool. The pair of synchronizing servers or pools is identified by a tag. The synchronization information is carried over the Multi-Chassis Synchronization (MCS) link between the two peers. MCS link is a logical link (IP, or MPLS).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 address of the peer.
Specifies a synchronization tag to be used while synchronizing DHCP server or pools.
